main.name: Noé Andrés Canú
main.description: Need help building and/or maintaining your software? Just ping me
main.bio: I'm a software consultant with more than 6 years of experience working with companies and organizations to deliver high quality software and infrastructure across Canada, U.S. and Guatemala . My primary stack is React JS, Node JS and Java. I have experience working on System Design, Architecture, UI, Backend, Databases and Infrastructure.
main.contactmessage: Contact me to my email: ncanugomez@gmail.com

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Algorithms and Data Structures, Systems Design, Databases

work.title: Fullstack Developer
work.description: Worked on TELUS OrderHub team to design, develop and test the portal for internet, TV and phone providing for B2B and consumers. Portal built using technologies such as React, Redux, NodeJS, Redis. Additionally worked with Openshift using Docker and Jenkins.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Business Suite from scratch with modules of HR, ERP, Ticket support and more using AngularJS, React and Java EE. Mobile Applications with native Android.
